Treasury Design System
  • Visual Style
  • Components

Components

The U.S. Treasury Design System is designed for implementing Treasury branding with simplicity and consistency across Treasury web apps and sites, while providing you with plug-and-play design and HTML/CSS.

  • Header: U.S. Government Banner
  • Header: Application
  • Header: Global Nav
  • Breadcrumbs
  • Footer
  • Buttons
  • Text Input
  • Textarea
  • Checkbox
